executive_context.baseline_summary: The organization maintained a stable security posture during the reporting period, with no critical incidents and effective control coverage across users and assets.

summary: 2 new user(s) were onboarded during the period.
7 user(s) were deprovisioned during the period.

positive_observations: No users failed phishing simulations this period.
All monitored devices have healthy backup status.
No high-severity EDR incidents were detected.
recommendations: Continue regular phishing simulations and security awareness training.
Ensure backup coverage remains enabled for all endpoints.
Maintain strict identity lifecycle management processes.
Continue proactive endpoint monitoring and threat detection.
